items.name: Margherita
items.description: A hugely popular margherita, with a deliciously tangy single cheese topping

items.name: Double Cheese Margherita
items.description: The ever-popular Margherita - loaded with extra cheese... oodies of it

items.name: Farm House
items.description: A pizza that goes ballistic on veggies! Check out this mouth watering overload of crunchy, crisp capsicum, succulent mushrooms and fresh tomatoes

items.name: Peppy Paneer
items.description: Chunky paneer with crisp capsicum and spicy red pepper - quite a mouthful!

items.name: Mexican Green Wave
items.description: A pizza loaded with crunchy onions, crisp capsicum, juicy tomatoes and jalapeno with a liberal sprinkling of exotic Mexican herbs.

items.name: Deluxe Veggie
items.description: For a vegetarian looking for a BIG treat that goes easy on the spices, this one's got it all.. The onions, the capsicum, those delectable mushrooms - with paneer and golden corn to top it all.

items.name: Veg Extravaganza
items.description: A pizza that decidedly staggers under an overload of golden corn, exotic black olives, crunchy onions, crisp capsicum, succulent mushrooms, juicyfresh tomatoes and jalapeno - with extra cheese to go all around.

items.name: Cheese and Corn
items.description: Cheese I Golden Corn | Cheese n Corn Pizza

items.name: Fresh Veggie
items.description: Onion & Capsicum

items.name: Veggie Paradise
items.description: Goldern Corn, Black Olives, Capsicum & Red Paprika

items.name: Spaghetti in Pink Sauce
items.description: This pasta is mixture of white and red sauce combination makes it little creamy and little tangy and little spicy.

items.name: Spaghetti in Red Sauce
items.description: Spaghetti pasta made with tomato sauce , cloves garlic, herbs, and onions makes it little tangy and spicy

items.name: Spaghetti in White Sauce
items.description: Spaghetti cooked with white cream and cheese topped with fresh broccoli , olives, chopped garlic ,onion and whisk with special herbs

items.name: Spaghetti with Aglio Olio
items.description: Spaghetti pasta made with good rich of cream , cheese and cooked with mushrooms

items.name: Creamy Mushroom Pasta
items.description: Decadent and sumptuous this creamy and cheesy penne pasta with only mushroom makes it amazing for mushroom lovers.

items.name: Penne Pasta in White Sauce
items.description: Decadent and sumptuous, this creamy, cheesy penne pasta is comfort food at its best

items.name: Penne Pasta in Red Sauce
items.description: Easy, delicious penne pasta cooked in a red creamy spicy tomato based sauce

items.name: Penne Pasta in Mixed Sauce
items.description: Sumptious pasta tossed with veggies and coated with a blend of red tomato based sauce and white sauce

items.name: Penne Pasta in Cheese Sauce
items.description: Cheesy gooey pasta tossed with veggies and cooked in a blend of rich, 3 cheese sauce

items.name: Tandoori Sauce Penne Pasta
items.description: Irressistible mild spiced, creamy and tangy penne variety pasta in a tandoori masala sauce.| served with Seasoning|

items.name: Aloo Patty
items.description: The traditional aloo patty seasoned with special herbs and spices with your choice of crisp fresh veggies, on freshly baked bread.

items.name: Chicken Kofta
items.description: Chicken that's coarsely ground is laced with a hint of Indian spices mix.

items.name: Chicken Slice
items.description: Savory sliced chicken slice with your choice of fresh vegetables all served on freshly baked bread.

items.name: Corn & Peas
items.description: A delicious assortment of green peas, golden corns and crunchy dices of carrot , blended in a creamy mixture of eggless mayo sauce.

items.name: Hara Bhara Kebab
items.description: Served on a freshly baked bread, nutritious spinach base with an abundance of exotic Indian spice mix.

items.name: Veggie Delight Salad
items.description: Cucumber, tomato, mix bell pepper, broccoli, black olive and red onion served on a bed of assorted lettuce with honey mustard vinaigrette and multigrain bread roll

items.name: Veg Caesar Salad
items.description: Yellow bell pepper, green bell pepper, red bell pepper, onion slice, black olive, parmesan cheese and bread crouton served on a bed of assorted lettuce with homemade caesar dressing & multigrain bread

items.name: Raw Papaya Salad
items.description: Raw papaya, french beans, sprout, carrot, cherry tomato, red bell pepper, yellow bell pepper, green bell pepper, peanut and fresh mint served on a bed of assorted lettuce with sweet chili vinaigrette & multigrain bread

items.name: Grilled Asian Veg Salad
items.description: Asian style grilled paneer, baby spinach, red cabbage, English carrot, white radish, spring onion, roasted peanut and cherry tomato served on a bed of Chinese cabbage with sweet chili vinaigrette.

items.name: Cottage Cheese and Grilled Veggie Salad
items.description: Grilled cottage cheese, zucchini, carrot, broccoli, mushroom, french beans, red bell pepper, yellow bell pepper, green bell pepper and jalapenos served on a bed of assorted lettuce and balsamic vinaigrette & multigrain bread

items.name: Lava Cake
items.description: Filled with delecious molten chocolate inside.

items.name: Butterscotch Mousse Cake
items.description: A Creamy & Chocolaty indulgence with layers of rich, fluffy Butterscotch Cream and delicious Dark Chocolate Cake, topped with crunchy Dark Chocolate morsels - for a perfect dessert treat!
